long_description: Incredibly thin and light, the Vestal Digichord Digital Watch sports a polycarbonate case that is only 5.5mm at its thickest point. That's not much thicker than a couple of compact discs! This watch is super lightweight; if you didn't get so many compliments while wearing it, then you'd forget you had it on. 12-hour premium digital movement with date. 24mm wide polyurethane strap with locking keeper and stainless-steel buckle holds the ultra-thin, 41mm-wide ABS plastic case to your wrist. The Vestal Digichord Digital Watch features a PMMA plastic crystal and resists light splashes.
short_description: Incredibly thin and light, the Vestal Digichord Digital Watch sports a polycarbonate case that is only 5.5mm at its thickest point. That's not much thicker than a couple of compact discs!
